summary.subject: Senior Lecturer in Computer Science, Specialisation in AI Engineering (Permanent Position) - Karlstad University, Sweden
summary.position: Senior Lecturer in Computer Science, Specialisation in AI Engineering
summary.department: Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, Karlstad University

duties: Contribute to teaching and research in the AI domain.
Conduct innovative research in AI Engineering.
Expand the department’s research competencies related to engineering AI-based systems.
Deliver courses on topics such as MLOps, quality assurance, and optimizing architectures of AI systems.
Engage in collaboration with industry and other academic entities.
Contribute to course administration, development, and degree project supervision.
qualifications: Doctoral degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field.
assessment_criteria: Teaching merits in computer science applied to AI Engineering.
Recent research experience in AI Engineering.
International work experience or national/network collaboration.
